## ContractUpgradePayloadBuilder class

A builder for [TransactionPayload](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.md) objects, to be used for Smart Contract upgrade transactions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ContractUpgradePayloadBuilder 
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [setCode(code)](./sdk-core.contractupgradepayloadbuilder.setcode.md) |  | Sets the code of the Smart Contract. |
|  [setCodeMetadata(codeMetadata)](./sdk-core.contractupgradepayloadbuilder.setcodemetadata.md) |  | Sets the code metadata of the Smart Contract. |
